result.execSummary:
The defendant Chalye S Hanson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Chalye S Hanson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Chalye S Hanson was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: AODA and comply.  Counts 2 and 3 dismissed.

miscConds.notes: The fine is $3462.00 payable to probation.  DNA sample and $250.00 surcharge.
Blood Draw Reimbursment to Portage Police Department.

timeConds.notes:
Huber privileges subject to jail policies.  May transfer to Marquette County with electronic monitoring according to jail rules.  Good time allowed.
03/17/15 - AMENDED - Loss of all Good Time due to jail violations

records.addlTxt: ADA Troy Cross appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant appeared in person in custody with Atty Jason Gonzalez.  Also 14CM634 now dismissed as refiled as felony 15CF81.  Complaint received, formal reading waived.  Preliminary hearing waived, waiver filed.  Rights/elements.  Probable cause found, bound over for further proceedings.  Information filed, reading waived.  Rights/elements.  Court changes plea questionnaire and post conviction form to reflect correct Case number.  Defendant plead guilty to Count 1.  Counts 2 and 3 dismissed.  Adjudged guilty, JOC entered.  Sentence withheld, placed on 3 years probation.    6 months additional  conditional jail time with huber consecutive to any time previously imposed.  AODA and comply.  Not to possess/consume alcohol.  36  month revocation/ 36  month interlock uon licensure.  May transfer to Marquette County with electronic monitoring according to jail rules.  Good time allowed.  Cash bond can be returned to posted.  3462.00 plus fine/costs.    $65 blood draw reimbursement.  DNA sample/surcharge.  Jail credit:  2 days.
